stories.text:
Is it all about advertising/marketing/sales? Is it that co-op members avoid future investment and drive research costs down. Is it because monopolies offer outsized returns to investors? where as co-ops only offer marginal cost incentives for consumers.

I consider wikipedia a co-op of sorts but google, facebook, cell phone companies, oil companies all seem to eventually become cartels of sorts.
